Elegantiole

Datus, Augustinus. Elegantiole.

Leipzig: Wolfgang Stöckel, 1497
4o. [47]leaves.
ISTC id00093500 Goff D93a; H 6022; IBP 1851; Günt(L) 1531; Pr 3057; Bod-inc D-033; Sheppard 2157; GW 8132

 

Shelf-mark:   Summerfield B1438  
Provenance:   Unknown.  
Binding:   19th or 20th century.  
Annotations:   This book has almost as much marginalia as it does text. Could be very valuable for insight into 16th century humanism.  
Decoration:   None.  
Imperfections:   Binding in poor shape. Some staining. ​
